title: Lincoln Ellsworth—American Polar Explorer (Part II)
description: by Buddy Levy In Part I published previously on The History Reader, author Buddy Levy introduces readers to Lincoln Ellsworth and shares how he and famed explorer Roald Amundsen first met. Now, Buddy Levy concludes his focus on Ellsworth, sharing Ellsworth’s adventures via the Norge airship and his trans-Antarctic airplane flight. Read on for Part […] The post Lincoln Ellsworth—American Polar Explorer (Part II) appeared first on The History Reader.
author: Sara Beth Haring
